Last BSA/AML Independent Test Workpapers

Read the summary text. Select CONTINUE when you are finished reviewing the summary text.

A local accounting firm was secured to perform the institution's last BSA/AML independent testing. The report provided cited no significant BSA/AML findings and was presented to the Board of Directors almost 11 months ago. The workpapers for this audit were provided to your exam team during pre-examination.

 

The review of the workpapers:

 

  • Identified the scope of the audit performed
  • Did not reveal any adverse issues about the scope or audit procedures.
  • Did not reveal any weaknesses that were not identified in the audit results.

Examiner Reference Tool - Task 41
